messages.subject: Shinsa Services for Tosogu
messages.msgSnippet: All, I currently have a business partner in Japan and we have set up an NBTHK Shinsa service for Tosogu only. We may add Token at a later date but for the
messages.messageBody:
All, I currently have a business partner in Japan and we have set up an
NBTHK Shinsa service for Tosogu only. We may add Token at a later date
but for the moment, it is just fittings and koshirae only.

If anyone is interested, please feel free to visit
http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/Shinsa_Services.html for more
information and if you have any other questions, feel free to ask me.

Thanks for the band width

Rich Turner


--
Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board <http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>

/- for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihontô/
